entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who did not think Sirius was a coward for staying in Grimmauld Place. He is also described as having an ugly look on his face.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who wants Harry to stop having dreams about Voldemort and is making him take Occlumency lessons with Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who will be teaching Harry Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is aghast at the idea of taking extra lessons with Snape and would rather have nightmares about Voldemort.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who agrees with Dumbledore's decision to make Harry take Occlumency lessons with Snape.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as one of the adults who will be escorting Harry, Ron, and Hermione on the Knight Bus.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as one of the adults who will be escorting Harry, Ron, and Hermione on the Knight Bus.

entities.name: volde-mort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone whom Harry has been having dreams about.

relationships.description: Dumbledore assigns Snape the task of teaching Harry Occlumency lessons.
Ron opposes the idea of taking extra lessons with Snape and would rather have nightmares about Voldemort.
